deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"166087a0fcd8ea354a921f4687f0b2542c95d8d5","repoName":"KaunteyShah/credit-risk-analysis-tool","actor":"KaunteyShah","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix Azure deployment data loading - add robust path resolution

- Add multiple path resolution strategies for CSV files
- Improve logging for Azure deployment debugging
- Handle different working directory structures in Azure
- Maintain fallback data when files not found
- Debug paths: project_root, getcwd, relative paths

This should fix the issue where Azure shows only 10 fallback companies
instead of 509 real companies from Sample_data2.csv"}
